import React from 'react'; import Quote from './Quote'; class Service extends React.Component{ constructor(){ super(); this.state={ from:"", to:"", weight:"", length:"", breadth:"", height:"", }; } handleChange = (e)=>{ this.setState({[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } handleSubmit = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault(); if (true){ this.props.submitQuote({from:this.state.from, to:this.state.to, weight:this.state.weight, length:this.state.length, breadth:this.state.breadth, height:this.state.height}); } } render(){ console.log(new Date()); if (this.props.service){ return(

{this.props.service.name}

{this.props.service.slogan}

Parcel Size
Package can size up to {this.props.service.psize} (total dimensions of 3 sides) and {this.props.service.pweight}.
Package Charges
Packages are charged on the basis on their weightand travel distance.

); } return null; } } export default Service;
